If anyone has trouble opening this after download, this is what to do:
Right click on the file
go to properties
click on compatability
click on "Run this program in compatability mode for"
click on the scroll down dox
then click on Windows XP (SERVICE PACK 3)
Click on apply

This should sort the problem
